Owlhawk:  As I already said we aquire these Beast
Modes based on the DNA of local animals to conteract
the radiation.  Also through experiences with an alien
race called the Vok, some bots like myself have become
transmetal.  Transmetals can be damaged by energon
radiation, but have a much higher tolerance for it. 
Here however the energon radiation seems to fluctuate
from nearly zero, to off the scale.  So much even a
transmetal can be damaged by it outside of Beast Mode.

--- Azure The Warrior <wingedwarrior41@...>
wrote:
> Katya refrained to protest about the fact that her
> mech was by far better 
> then those made on Terra. It was irrelevant and she
> knew it. What bothered 
> her was the efficiency of Owlhawk considering these
> radiations.
> 
> Katya: Is there a mean to counteract the radiations?
> 
>

> you

> >Modes.  We use it for power, but to much of it can
> >cause damage in robot mode.  Earth is rich in it,
> and
> >has enormous amounts of radiation.  My guess is
> that

> organic,
